<rgb=#00CCFF>Fire and Frost Lore:</rgb> Becomes AoE
<rgb=#00CCFF>SoP:Righteousness:</rgb> +20s Duration
<rgb=#00CCFF>SoP:See All Ends:</rgb> Doubled Effectiveness
<rgb=#00CCFF>SoP: Vigilance:</rgb> Increases allies' Critical Defence
<rgb=#00CCFF>Air Lore:</rgb> Applies a Bubble
<rgb=#00CCFF>Water Lore:</rgb> Becomes AoE
<rgb=#00CCFF>Beacon of Hope:</rgb> Increased Potency
<rgb=#00CCFF>Wind Lore:</rgb> Increased Potency
<rgb=#00CCFF>Burning Embers:</rgb> Becomes AoE
<rgb=#00CCFF>Gust of Wind:</rgb> Increased Damage and applies Brittle Frost
<rgb=#00CCFF>Wizard's Frost:</rgb> Becomes AoE and Increases Enemy Inductions
<rgb=#00CCFF>Wizard's Fire:</rgb> Devastating Burn
<rgb=#00CCFF>Wizard's Spark:</rgb> Stuns Target
